item.trans: adj. 模糊的；晦涩的；昏暗的 vt. 遮掩；使变暗；使难理解 同义词:fuzzy, dark, vague, lowering, overcurtain, becloud The moon was obscured by clouds.月亮被云朵遮掩了。
n. 困惑；窘境；为难 同义词:corner, confusion Theorists have proposed ways of resolving this quandary .理论家提出了一些方法来解释这个问题。
vt. 使…迷惑；使…失去方向感 同义词:bemaze I felt like I was on the Disorient Express for good this time .我感觉我这次就要永远这么晕下去了。
adj. 贪得无厌的；不知足的 同义词:sateless, avaricious He traces all the miseries and discontents of life to insatiable selfishness .他把人生一切苦难和不满都归咎于不知足的自私。
n. 生物区（系）；一时代（一地区）的动植物 同义词:bioregion, biotic district It is now clear that habitats and biota do frequently change .现在已经清楚，生境和生物群确实经常变化。
n. 标准，条件（criterion的复数） 同义词:standards, conditions, indexes People who meet these criteria often have multiple cases of alcoholism in their families .符合这些准则的人，通常在其家族中也有多起酒瘾的例子。

n. 垂体；脑垂体 adj. 脑垂体的；脑垂体分泌失调引起的 The anterior glandular lobe of the pituitary gland that secretes many hormones , including ACTH , prolactin , and somatotropin.腺性垂体前叶脑下垂体腺的腺性前叶，可分泌包括促肾上腺皮质激素、乳汁刺激素以及促长激素的多种激素。
adj. 严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的 同义词:strict, rigid, precise, severe, tight Science needs more competition between hypotheses and ever more rigorous tests as well.科学始终需要各个假说之间的竞争和严格的检验。
n. 环境；周围；出身背景 同义词:context, circumstance, setting, surrounding, condition He was born in a social milieu where further education was a luxury .他生在一个受较高教育就被认为是奢侈的社会环境里。
n. 旋转，[力] 回转；螺层 同义词:revolution, rotation, rolling, turning In this case , a charged particle has a simple cyclotron gyration .在这种情况下，带电粒子有一个简单的回旋回转。
n. 赞助者；主办者；保证人 vt. 赞助；发起 同义词:friend, guarantee, entrepreneur, launch, support of The meeting was sponsored by 16 countries.此次会议是由16个国家发起召开的。
n. 肺炎 同义词:pulmonitis A study in Pakistan found that children with severe pneumonia can recover fully at home taking antibiotics by mouth .巴基斯坦的一项研究发现，患严重肺炎的儿童也可以通过在家口服抗生素痊愈。
vt. 限制；使具有资格；证明…合格 vi. 取得资格，有资格 同义词:block, set a limit to, be in a position, be qualified to His skills qualify him for the work.他的技能使他能担当这项工作。
n. [植] 巨藻，海藻；海草灰 vi. 烧制海草灰 同义词:seaweed, varech A forest of deep- kelp sways with the tides .海底丛丛的海草随著潮水摇曳生姿；
adj. 极好的；华丽的；宏伟的 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, grand, great Those states have done a superb job of managing their deer , elk and bear .这些州在管理野鹿、麋鹿和野熊方面做的很好。
vt. 对…施行针刺疗法 n. 针刺；[中医] 针刺疗法 同义词:needling, pinprick Perhaps acupuncture also sends messages through the nerves .或许针灸疗法也通过神经传递信息。

n. 玩忽职守；不法行为；治疗不当 同义词:dereliction, fall asleep at the switch He also announced a surprising idea to use executive authority to encourage state -level experiments in curbing malpractice abuses.他还提出了一个出人意料的观点，即用行政权力来鼓励各州遏制玩忽职守。
n. [数] 矩阵；模型；[生物][地质] 基质；母体；子宫；[地质] 脉石 同义词:model, shape, former, substrate How do I multiply a matrix by a vector ?我怎么用一个矩阵乘以一个向量呢？
adj. 温顺的；谦恭的；驯服的 同义词:quiet, docile Blessed are the meek , for they will inherit the earth .柔和的人有福阿！因为他们必承受得地土。
n. [高能] 强子（参与强相互作用的基本粒子） Its successor , CERN 's Large Hadron Collider, will also use protons .它的继任者，欧洲核子研究组织（CERN）的「大强子对撞机」，用的也是质子。
adj. 北部的；偏僻的 n. 州的北部 adv. 在州的北部；在州内远离大城市地区 同义词:northern, remote, lonely IT IS what passes for a winter 's day upstate São Paulo.这是今年冬天圣保罗州北部发生的事情。

n. 公立救济院；私立济贫院或养老院 Public general hospital originated in the almshouse infirmaries established as early as colonial times by local governments to care for the poor .公立医院脱胎于殖民地初期救济院的医务所，这些机构是地方政府为穷人修建的。
n. 罚款，罚金；处罚 同义词:fine, amercement The penalty for helping Jews was instant execution .帮助犹太人的面临的处罚是立即处决。
vt. 描绘；描写；画…的轮廓 同义词:represent, trace, picture, figure The teacher delineated China on the blackboard with a coloured chalk.老师用彩色粉笔在黑板上勾勒出中国的边界。
vt. 取笑；戏弄；梳理；欺负；强求；使起毛 n. 戏弄；爱纠缠的小孩；挑逗者；卖弄风骚的女孩 vi. 取笑 同义词:guy, exact, kid, razz, poke fun at, to make fun of He teased Mary with a jest.他说俏皮话逗玛丽。
n. 暴民，暴徒；民众；乌合之众 vt. 大举包围，围攻；蜂拥进入 vi. 聚众生事，聚众滋事 同义词:mass, clamjamfry, beleaguer The shop was mobbed by a large crowd.这家商店遭到一大群人的袭击。
n. 优势；多数；占优势 同义词:majority, superiority, advantage, edge, dominance A second problem is the preponderance of family -controlled firms .另一个问题是家族企业占多数。
n. 寄生虫；食客 同义词:helminth, vermin Mistletoe is a parasite plant .它是一种寄生植物。
vi. 撞击；侵犯 vt. 撞击 同义词:knock against, to infringe on, impact, strike Rays of light impinge upon the water.光线射到水面上。
n. 蛹化 Over the last 40 years , though, the global adult bluefin tuna pupation population declined by over 80%.在过去的40年内，全球的成年金枪鱼数量减少了超过80%。
vi. 屈服；死；被压垮 同义词:to surrender, genuflect Most of us are known to succumb to persuasion through the media.我们之中的大多数人都抵挡不住传播媒介的宣传。
adj. 兼职的；兼管数个教堂的 同义词:part-time Chinese nation is unity of pluralistic society .中华民族是一个多元一体的复合体。
adj. 骨盆的 A behavior pattern as complex as midwifery obviously does not fossilize , but pelvic bones do.助产是个复杂的行为模式，不会留下化石，但是骨盆会。
adj. 神话的；神话学的；虚构的 同义词:fictitious, imaginary A vimana is a mythological flying machine , described in the ancient literature of India .维曼拿斯是神话般的飞行器，在古代印度的文献里有描写。

n. 自动化；自动操作 同义词:robotization, automatic operation Semantic descriptions of device capabilities and functionality will let us achieve such automation with minimal human intervention.以语意描述设备的性能和功能，将会让我们获得最高的自动化结果。
n. 象限；[海洋][天] 象限仪；四分之一圆 同义词:sector, orthant Reports from every quadrant of the globe said the Earth was unraveling .从地球的每一个信号区发回来的报告，都在说地球正在分解。
n. 术语，术语学；用辞 同义词:technology, onym The terminology of financial markets can be imprecise .金融市场术语的定义也许不那么精准。
vt. 焊接；使结合；使成整体 vi. 焊牢 n. 焊接；焊接点 同义词:combine, bond, jointing, soldering to weld the crack in the water pipe焊接水管的裂缝
vi. 篡改；干预；损害；削弱；玩弄；贿赂 vt. 篡改 n. 填塞者；捣棒 同义词:intervene in, take a hand in, manipulate, interpolate Don't tamper with my business.别干预我的事。
n. 课程 A curriculum -building tool helps educators create lesson plans on the site .课程编写工具帮助教学者在网站上创建课程计划。
n. [生理] 激素，荷尔蒙 同义词:incretion, corticosteroids Insulin , a hormone that regulates the metabolism of glucose , also crops up .胰岛素--调节葡萄糖新城代谢的荷尔蒙也会突然增多。

n. [会计] 账户；解释；[会计] 账目，账单；理由 vi. 解释；导致；报账 vt. 认为；把…视为 同义词:interpretation, explanation, construction, sake, reason, result in, to interpret, count, find, guess, feel, rate He was accounted a merciful man.他被人看做是一位仁者。
adj. 陈腐的；不新鲜的 vi. 变陈旧；撒尿；变得不新鲜 vt. 使变旧；变得不新鲜 n. 尿 同义词:banal, trite, urinate, urine, emiction Fresh thinking , instead of stale arguments , has rarely been so badly needed .新鲜的思维，而不是陈腐的争吵，似乎从未变得如此亟需。
adj. 后来的，随后的 同义词:succeeding, pursuant To this end , the first panel is generally quite short , with subsequent panels gradually increasing in length .这样做的结果是，第一个采区一般很短，接下来的采区一般逐渐增加长度。
n. 飞机；平面；程度，水平 vi. 刨；乘飞机旅行；翱翔 vt. 刨平；用刨子刨；掠过水面 adj. 平的；平面的 同义词:extent, degree, measure, level, airplane, fly in, upsoar, plain, two dimensional The carpenter planed a table smooth.木匠把桌面刨光了。
vt. 放射（过去式emanated，过去分词emanated，现在分词emanating，第三人称单数emanates，形容词emanative）；发散 vi. 发出；散发；发源 同义词:to send out, give off Great sadness emanated from her song.她的歌曲流露出巨大的忧伤之情。
n. 布洛芬，异丁苯丙酸（抗炎，镇痛药） 同义词:brufen Increasing calcium intake has been shown to prevent or reduce cramps, which are Best treated with ibuprofen .增加钙的摄入量近期被证实可以防止或减少疼痛，可用伊布普洛芬来治疗。
vi. 增殖；扩散；激增 vt. 使激增 同义词:surge, sharp rise, balloon proliferated ideas层出不穷的想法
adj. 虚拟的；假的 n. 傀儡；哑巴；仿制品 同义词:virtual, spurious, fantoccini, figure-head The designer dummied up the book so that they could study the format.设计师设计制作了空白样本，这样他们便能研究开本(或版式)。
n. 暴怒；暴跳；乱闹 vi. 狂暴；乱闹；发怒 同义词:fury, rough house, anger, chafe at A group of lawbreakers are rampaging around in the centre of the city.一群不法之徒正在市中心为非作歹。
vi. 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世 adj. 逝世的 同义词:leave, split, vary, quit, get out The train departs at 8：30 AM.列车于上午8点30分开出。
adj. 易受骗的；轻信的 同义词:naive, credulous That gullible ". For this is probably the most expensive green power in the world .因为这台电脑可能是世界上最贵的绿色能源了。
n. 哨兵 vt. 守卫，放哨 同义词:piquet, watcher, keep watch to sentinel a store守卫仓库
vt. 呼吸 vi. 呼吸 同义词:breathe, breathe Conclusion Clindamycin Hydrochlorideis beneficial to treatment respire infection in old patients.结论：克林霉素治疗老年呼吸道感染安全有效。
n. [地物] 极光；曙光 同义词:polar lights It was the Great Aurora of 1859 itself that ushered in a new paradigm.实际上，正是1859年这次「大极光事件」确立了新的学说。
n. 考古学家 Hawass, a famed archaeologist and Egyptologist , said the man 's name is Imhesy .哈瓦斯是著名的考古学家和埃及古物学家，他说这名男子叫伊米艾斯。
adj. 躯体的；肉体的；体壁的 同义词:material, carnal Somatic cells of angiosperms enter a regenerative phase and behave like embryos .被子植物体细胞进入一个生殖阶段，而且其行为象胚。
n. 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览圆 同义词:skewing, short trip But the point of an excursion is that you come home again .但是所谓旅行，那是终得归家来的。
vt. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 vi. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 n. 凿子 同义词:chip, sell, character, kid, pull a fast one, firmer It is a bust chiseled from a rock.那是一座石雕半身像。

n. 反动分子；保守论者 adj. 反动的 同义词:counterrevolutionary, retroactive He not only showed astonishing talent in literary creation , but also , based on the particular ancient Japanese anti- reactionist thought and culture , proposed a literary view on anti - benthamism .上田秋成是日本江户时代的著名小说家、国学家，不仅在文学创作方面展现了惊世才华，还以其独特的反复古主义国学思想为基础，提出了反功利主义的文学观。
n. [病理] 溃疡；腐烂物；道德败坏 同义词:sore, demoralization Gastritis may cause symptoms resembling those of peptic ulcer .胃炎可引起类似消化性溃疡的症状。
n. 官僚；官僚主义者 Manchu dynasty was different , it relyed on the Manchurian military and manchurian bureaucrat bloc.满清则不同，它所依靠的是旗人军事和官僚集团，不是来自于民间的文人官僚集团。
n. 疑论者，怀疑主义者（skeptic的复数形式） Now it looks like the skeptics were right .但是现在看来，当初的质疑完全正确。
vt. 抵押 n. 抵押 同义词:hold in pledge, hypothecate, hypothecation, pledge My father's business is failing; he's mortgaged all his assets so as to save it.我父亲的企业在亏损，他抵押了所有资产试图挽救它。
adj. 不变的；不可变的；不能变的 同义词:constant, permanent, steady We assume there is immutable about the school year 's rhythm .我们假定学年的节奏基本上保持不变。
n. 冲突；争吵；不和 同义词:interference, conflict, argument, war, collision Still , strife between the government and its employees was not inevitable , in his view .尽管如此，在他看来政府同其雇员间的冲突仍然不可避免。
n. 补语；余角；补足物 vt. 补足，补助 同义词:make up a loss, make sth up This year 's report will use the Alkire - Foster approach to complement its own Human Development Index .今年的报告还将采用阿尔凯尔-福斯特方法，作为其人类发展指数的补充。

n. 功能紊乱；机能障碍；官能不良 vi. 功能失调；出现机能障碍；垮掉 同义词:lesion, disfunction, crumble to dust If one area dysfunction or damage , another can step in like an understudy and play the role.要是一个区域失去功能或受损，另一个就会上场，取而代之，就像是替补演员。

adj. 世俗的；长期的；现世的；不朽的 n. 牧师 同义词:chronic, long time, standing, eternal, lay, minister, priest, preacher Indonesia prides itself on being a secular state that happens to have a Muslim majority .印尼人认为，该国是世俗国家，恰巧穆斯林占多数，他们对此感到自豪。
n. 顶点；[昆] 头顶；[天] 天顶 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, apex We shall present some of the basic properties of the vertex and edge chromatic numbers .我们将介绍顶点色数和边色数的一些基本性质。
vi. 发低哼声 vt. 用哼声表示 n. 嗡嗡声；哼声；杂声 int. 哼；嗯 同义词:groaning, zoom, uh-uh, um A bee hummed around flowers.一只蜜蜂围着花朵嗡嗡作响。
vi. 统治；管辖；裁定 n. 统治；规则 vt. 统治；规定；管理；裁决；支配 同义词:king it over, reign over, governance, regulation, order, define, regulate, manage, state, conduct Hilter ruled Germany for only 12 years.希特勒统治德国仅12年。
adj. 斜的；对角线的；斜纹的 n. 对角线；斜线 同义词:off-angle, pitched, solidus Emre makes a diagonal run, takes the ball past two then crosses at the near post . Calderoni collects.在左翼埃姆雷做了一个交叉跑动，连过两人后传到近角，卡尔德罗尼得到。
n. 中心，中央；中锋；中心点 vi. 居中，被置于中心 vt. 集中，使聚集在一点；定中心 adj. 中央的，位在正中的 同义词:focus, hub, middle, mediate, concentrate, localise, mid, ental Is this right subway to the Rockefeller Center ?这就是去洛克菲勒中心的地铁吗？
n. 腺 He read of animals with prolonged pregnancies whose fetuses lacked a gland .他了解到妊娠过长的动物，它们的胎儿缺少脑垂体前叶。

adj. 神圣的；非凡的；天赐的；极好的 vt. 占卜；预言；用占卜勘探 vi. 占卜；预言；使用占卜勘探矿 n. 牧师；神学家 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, wonderful, excellent, famous, predict, prognosticate, soothsay, minister, priest, preacher At last I divined the truth.最后我发现了事情的真相。
n. 原始人类；人科动物 adj. 人类及其祖先的 同义词:homonid This research is yielding clues to how the self may have evolved in our hominid ancestors .也就是我们每个人都拥有的，自己是个独立个体的认知。
n. 边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白 vt. 加边于；加旁注于 同义词:profit, gain, brink, suburb They said they had margined up.他们说他们已付保证金了。
vt. 使充实；使肥沃；使富足 同义词:fertilize Commerce enriches a nation.商业使一国富足。
n. 顺从，服从；承诺 同义词:commitment, obedience Many are also beefing up back-office operations , such as risk management and compliance .很多对冲基金还加强后台运作，例如风险管理和法规遵从。
n. 大农场经营者；大农场工人 The rancher wants us to Bring in more hay for his cattle .牧场主人希望我们为他的牲口带来更多的干草。

n. 赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿 同义词:implementation, tender, fulfillment But in jury trials , which were introduced in all Russian regions except Chechnya in 2002 , the acquittal rate is about 20%.而在陪审团审理（2002年，俄罗斯除车臣以外的其它地区都引入了这一制度）的案件中，宣判无罪的案件占到大约20%。
n. 大猩猩 The judge was an old gray gorilla .法官是一只年老的灰猩猩。
vt. 折磨；使痛苦；使苦恼 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear, devil She has been much afflicted by this sad news.她为此不幸的消息感到很难过。

adj. 出生的；诞生的；分娩的；出生地的 同义词:mother, partal One unique characteristic of salmon is they will come back to natal stream or area where they were born and raised .鲑鱼有一个独一无二的特征就是它们会回到原来它们出生和成长的地方，比如小溪或者是某个地区。
vi. 搅拌；搅动 vt. 搅拌；搅动 n. 搅乳器 同义词:mix round, stir up, mill, mix round to churn cream搅拌牛奶以制奶油
vt. 迷住，缠住；使…着迷；使…困扰 同义词:possess, spell They were obsessed by her song.他们都被她的歌声迷住了。
n. 大麻；大麻毒品 同义词:beng, ganja Marijuana is now by far California 's most valuable agricultural crop .大麻目前已经成为加利福尼亚州最有价值的农作物。
n. 二分法；两分；分裂；双歧分枝 同义词:disruption, fragmentation If this dichotomy is maintained what happens to the rate of interest ?如果保持这种二分法，利率会怎样呢？
n. 解放；释放 同义词:liberation, release, enfranchisement He dedicated his life to the emancipation of all mankind .他献身于全人类的解放。
n. 不足；缺乏 同义词:shortage, short of, deficiency, insufficient, need They do this, first , because the internet , in effect , eliminates scarcity in the medium .他们这么做，首先，是因为互联网，有效地消除了媒介中的缺乏。
n. 诱因，刺激物 同义词:stimulus, irritation They have little inducement to work harder .他们没有什麽更加努力工作的好处。

n. 弊病；疾病；腐败 同义词:corruption, sickness, complaint My child will not die of that frightful malady , for lack of succor .我的孩子不会死了，那种病，吓坏我了，现在她有救了。

n. 燃烧，氧化；骚动 同义词:burning, inflammation The most common type of reaction studied calorimetrically is combustion .量热研究中最常见的反应类型是燃烧反应。

n. 增加，增长；提高 vi. 增加，增大；繁殖 vt. 增加，加大 同义词:enhancement, growth, gain, raising, advance, improve, gain, accelerate, breed, make, enhance, boost, jack, mount, hot to increase speed增加速度
adj. 固有的；内在的；与生俱来的，遗传的 同义词:internal, native, intrinsic, immanent First , you can milk underlying patterns inherent in chaotic systems to make good predictions .首先，你可以抽取混沌系统固有的基本模式，取得良好的预测。
n. 最小值；最低限度；最小化；最小量 adj. 最小的；最低的 同义词:lowest, least, smallest No , not if you maintain a minimum balance of 500 dollars .如果你保持最少500美元的话就不收手续费。

n. 停止，中止；松懈 同义词:stop, stay, hang, stand, cessation Even if it is a fantasy or on illusion, so long as it shows a ray of hope it still urges you on in pursuit of that little sparkle without letup .不管是望梅止渴，还是画饼充饥，它都会激励你不停手中的浆，去追逐哪怕一星微小的火光。
vi. 默许；勉强同意 同义词:connive to acquiesce halfheartedly in a business plan半心半意地同意一项商业计划
n. 现款，现金 vt. 将…兑现；支付现款 同义词:ready, real money The bank will cash your cheque.银行会把你的支票兑成现金。
n. 碧玉；墨绿色 同义词:jade, deep green Jasper was very dangerous right now .贾斯帕现在就非常危险。

n. [地理] 峡湾（等于fiord） 同义词:forde, flord A coal-fired electric power plant supplies an oil refinery with waste heat from its steam turbines ( previously released into a nearby fjord ).一个燃煤发电厂向一个炼油厂提供蒸汽轮机产生的废热（以前此废热排放至一个附近的峡湾）。
n. 注意力分散；消遣；心烦意乱 同义词:entertainment, occupation, recreation, relaxation But attacking it is a bit of a distraction .但是对它的攻击也只是分散注意力。
n. 音调；色调 同义词:tone, hues I focused more on being relaxed and having clear, deep and slow tonality .我更加注重放松，并且发音低沉而又缓慢。
adj. 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的 同义词:powerful, terrible, august, horrible Here the practical challenges would be formidable .这在实践中将面临巨大的挑战。
vt. 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务 同义词:humor, meet the demand He has a small hotel and also caters for weddings and funerals.他开了一家小旅馆，并承办红白喜事的酒席。
adj. 啮齿类的；咬的，嚼的；侵蚀性的 n. [脊椎] 啮齿动物 同义词:corrosive, erosive, gnawer This small rodent can scoop out a long , narrow tunnel in a very short time .这种小啮齿动物能在很短的时间里挖出一条又长又窄的地道来。
n. 甲状腺；甲状软骨；甲状腺剂 adj. 甲状腺的；盾状的 同义词:hypothyroid, scutum, peltate, scutiform Iodine tends to localize in thyroid .碘易集中于甲状腺内。
adj. 可取消的，可废止的；可撤回的 同义词:retractable, rescissible It was a revokable at any time on whim of the authorities.这种恩赐只要当权者心血来潮随时可以取消。
n. 翼龙 Here was " like the ancient Yellow River ", " pterosaur Huanjiang" hometown .这里曾是“黄河古象”、“环江翼龙”的故乡。
n. 独奏者；独唱者 同义词:chazan, cantor The soloist received a huge bouquet of roses .独唱者得到了很大的一束玫瑰花。
adj. 响应的；应答的；回答的 同义词:answering But what if one side is a responsive mirror , just as the chameleon is, in part reflecting , in part generating ?那么，如果其中一面镜子具备了变色龙似的反应功能，既能反映又能生成图像会如何呢？

n. 半岛 同义词:byland, chersonese Beijing should explicitly sanction the possibility of a reunified peninsula even if that means accepting a strong US ally pressing against its border .对朝鲜半岛可能重新统一，中国应当明确支持，即使这意味着接受边境上出现一个强大的美国盟友。
n. 收入，收益；实收款项 同义词:earning, yield, receipt In any other case alcohol formed as the reaction proceeds cannot be oxidized .在其它任何情况下，反应进行时所生成的醇，不能被氧化。
vt. 生产；引起；创作 n. 农产品，产品 vi. 生产，创作 同义词:attract, cause, operate, occasion, induce, manufacture, work, agricultural products, turn out, bring in The man produced a ticket from his pocket.那人从衣袋里掏出一张票。
n. [地质] 玻陨石；[地质] 熔融石；似曜岩类 同义词:queenstownite
n. [有化] 尼古丁；[有化] 烟碱 The body becomes addicted to the nicotine in tobacco .身体会变得对烟草中的尼古丁上瘾。
adj. 重要的；决定性的；定局的；决断的 同义词:important, considerable, material, critical, big One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team , but one man cannot make a team .一个人可以是一个团队的关键要素，但一个人永远不能成为一个团队。
n. 始祖，祖先；被继承人 同义词:father, root, grandfather Our grandfathers ancestored some of the well-known families in Beijing.我们的祖父辈是北京几家望族的祖先。
n. 奴佛卡因（一种麻醉药） The dentist deadened the nerve Novocaine .牙医用奴佛卡因麻醉神经。
vt. 公布；传播；发表 同义词:deliver, post, notify, transmit to promulgate regulation颁布规则

adj. 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的 adv. 紧紧地；彻底地 同义词:severe, hard, fast, sealed, rigorous, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, fast Tight credit could suppress any rebound in spending , furthermore .此外，信贷紧缩可能抑制开支复苏苗头。

n. [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者 同义词:carnivore, reiver Laws that bar sex offenders from living in so many places should be repealed , because there is no evidence that they protect anyone predator can always travel.应当废除给性犯罪者居住地设定诸多限制的法律，并没有证据表明这些法律保护了谁，因为性犯罪者可以随意搬迁。
adj. 卫生的，清洁的 n. 公共厕所 同义词:clean, hygienic, latrine, public convenience I hope you 'll be able to improve the sanitary conditions .我希望你们今后能更好地改善卫生条件。
vt. 拥抱；信奉，皈依；包含 vi. 拥抱 n. 拥抱 同义词:involve, contain, hug, cuddle, hug He embraced his daughter tenderly.他温柔地拥抱女儿。
adj. 过时的，不流行的 v. 使不流行（outmode的过去分词） 同义词:ancient, unpopular His political philosophy tends to be written of as an outmoded fantasy .他的政治哲学往往被看作是过时的幻想而被认为一文不值。
adj. 插句的；附加说明的；放在括号里的 Don't use footnotes for parenthetical comments .脚注不要用来做附加说明式的评论。
n. [计] 缓冲区；缓冲器，[车辆] 减震器 vt. 缓冲 同义词:dashpot, oscillation absorber The drug buffered her pain.这药物减轻了她的痛苦。
n. 不同；不一致；不等 同义词:difference, inequality, variance Then the question arises . Is this one disparity sufficient to operate as a bar to such a marriage ?那么，问题就来了，只有一点不相称，难道就能作为这么一桩婚姻的障碍吗？
vt. 责难，责备 n. 责难 vi. 谴责，责备 同义词:impugn, decry, decrial, dyslogy, accuse of, blame for The traffic policeman censured the driver but didn't fine him.交通警察严厉地批评了这位汽车司机，但对他没有进行罚款。
n. 退休金，抚恤金；津贴；膳宿费 vt. 发给养老金或抚恤金 同义词:retirement pay, subsidy John is pensioned by the employer and has departed from the company.雇主给约翰养老金让其退休，他已离开了公司。
